copy.header: Disney Fairies: "Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue"
copy.body1: The Minister of Summer has a very special task for you - to find and grow the rare Rainbow Lily for this year's End-of-Summer Celebration! Interact with Lizzy and team up with your Fairy friends to bring each of the six rare lilies to Fairy Camp. Complete quests, play mini-games and adventure through the Mainland to capture the Rainbow Lily before summer is over!
